law.catch_line: Each political party shall have a State central committee that:...

text.section:
Each political party shall have a State central committee that:
is the governing body of the political party; and
may be composed of the members of the central committees of the counties during their terms in office.

section.section: A party's State central committee shall select the chairman or co-chairmen of the party State central committee.
The chairman or co-chairmen shall be residents of the State during their tenure in office.

text.section: A party's State central committee shall determine its own rules of procedure, not inconsistent with the provisions of this article.
